channel.title: DailyGame GamesDailygame
channel.description: DailyGame's videogame news and reviews for Xbox, PlayStation 2, PS2, Nintendo GameCube and Game Boy Advance.

item.title: New RSS/XML Feed URLS
item.description: New site means new URLs for our RSS/XML feeds.

item.title: EA Announces the "Madden NFL 2005" Soundtrack
item.description: It's a mix of hip-hop and rock. Who'd have ever guessed that?

item.title: "NCAA Football 2005" Goes Gold
item.description: The first Xbox Live-enabled game from EA is on its way.

item.title: Sierra Games Closing Its Doors?
item.description: Nearly its entire staff will be laid off as hundreds more VU employees also say goodbye.

item.title: Team Rainbow Goes "cube-ing"
item.description: Ubi ships "Rainbow Six 3" for the GameCube

item.title: Golden "Tales"
item.description: The GameCube's got a new RPG on the way from Namco.

item.title: Brooke Burke to Star in "Need for Speed Underground 2"
item.description: Would you like a little sex appeal with your tricked-out ride?

item.title: EA Creates a Fantasy Football League
item.description: It'll cost you to be a commissioner, but if you're a sports statistics nut, you probably won't care.

item.title: EA Ships its Next "Harry Potter" Videogame
item.description: "The Prisoner of Azkaban" is now available in retail stores throughout North America.

item.title: "Madden NFL 2005" to Become Collectible
item.description: The PS2 version has some exclusive specials. Find out about the "collector's edition" inside.

item.title: DailyGame's "Best of E3" Awards
item.description: After much deliberation, cogitation and procrastination, we unveil our choices for the best games at the show.

item.title: Nintendo Names its Next Console
item.description: Well, if you count code names, that is.

item.title: E3 Booth Wrapup: Electronic Arts
item.description: Big booth. Big games. Big promises. Big smiles. EA's on a roll....

item.title: E3 Booth Wrapup: Sega
item.description: The company’s “explosive” news must not have related to the games in their booth.
